name: REG_WKFL_EVAL_METRIC
description: The REG_WKFL_EVAL_METRIC table contains the specific bypassed warning metrics (IDNs) tracking warnings evaluated during a Registration workflow.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated workflow in this patient contact. Together with PAT_ENC_CSN_ID, this forms the foreign key to the REG_WORKFLOW_PROD table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple metrics that are associated with the patient contact and the workflow from the REG_WORKFLOW_PROD table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.
